typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		project as string,
		studyid as string,
		Subject as string,
		Site as string,
		SiteNumber as string,
		SiteGroup as string,
		InstanceName as string,
		InstanceRepeatNumber as string,
		FolderName as string,
		DataPageName as string,
		RecordPosition as string,
		SaveTS as string,
		ICDAT as string,
		ICTIM as string,
		ICDTTM as string,
		ICMONYR as string,
		ICYR as string,
		PROTOCOL as string,
		PROTOCOL_STD as string,
		ENCOHORT as string,
		ENCOHORT_STD as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> AL0031ICF
source(output(
		project as string,
		studyid as string,
		Subject as string,
		Site as string,
		SiteNumber as string,
		SiteGroup as string,
		InstanceName as string,
		InstanceRepeatNumber as string,
		FolderName as string,
		DataPageName as string,
		RecordPosition as string,
		SaveTS as string,
		ICDAT as string,
		ICTIM as string,
		ICDTTM as string,
		ICMONYR as string,
		ICYR as string,
		PROTOCOL as string,
		PROTOCOL_STD as string,
		ENCOHORT as string,
		ENCOHORT_STD as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> AL1011ICF
AL0031ICF derive(Date = trim(ICDAT)) ~> DerivedColumn1
AL1011ICF derive(Date = trim(DSSTDAT_C)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 union(byName: true)~> Union
Union sink(input(
		project as string,
		studyid as string,
		Subject as string,
		Site as string,
		SiteNumber as string,
		SiteGroup as string,
		InstanceName as string,
